thread.title: Arsene Wenger leaving Arsenal would be a massive loss | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Arsene Wenger leaving Arsenal would be a massive loss | Daily Mail Online

author: Oliver Holt For The Mail On Sunday
title: Arsene Wenger leaving Arsenal would be a massive loss | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Call me an idiot, but those who want Arsene Wenger to leave Arsenal will end up regretting it when he's gone Arsenal might not be in a great place but it could be so much worse than it is If he does end up leaving this summer those who go against him will have won We also don't have to agree with supporters who carry banners with them It is not as if Wenger isn't successful - he is, has been and will be again Published: 22:33 GMT, 11 February 2017 | Updated: 00:31 GMT, 12 February 2017 88 shares
